Description:
NPE throws out when modify a flatfile dataset has no select flatfile[0700]

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070702-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a flatfile datasource and specify a valid path
2, New a flatfile dataset using the flatfile
3, Modify the flatfile datasource to a invalid path
4, Open the flatfile dataset(make sure there is no valid select flatfile) and click OK button

Expected result:
After step4, the dialog is closed with no exceptions

Actual result:
After step4, NPE throws out

Error log:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.datatools.connectivity.oda.flatfile.ui.wizards.FileSelectionWizardPage.getResultSetMetaData(FileSelectionWizardPage.java:1146)
	at org.eclipse.datatools.connectivity.oda.flatfile.ui.wizards.FileSelectionWizardPage.savePage(FileSelectionWizardPage.java:1645)
	at org.eclipse.datatools.connectivity.oda.flatfile.ui.wizards.FileSelectionWizardPage.collectDataSetDesign(FileSelectionWizardPage.java:270)

This is a DTP oda.flatfile bug, and must be designated as such to trigger the DTP 1.5.1 daily build.
Bug fix must be committed to the R1.5 folder in DTP CVS for the 1.5.1 build.
checkin made to R1.5, with corresponding manifest updated to post Europa
